biography:
Yoshito Yasuhara (安原 義人, Yasuhara Yoshito, November 17, 1949) is a Japanese actor, voice actor and narrator. He is 168 cm tall and his blood type is B. He is married to the actress and seiyū Yuri Kimura (木村有里).

Born in Aioi City, Hyogo Prefecture, he graduated from Himeji High School, a school attached to Toyo University. He is a member of Theatre Echo, a theatre troupe and talent management firm known for its comedy sketches.
name: Yoshito Yasuhara
